title: Linen Closets, Online Payments Available, Spacious Floor Plans
posting_body: The bright lights of the Vegas Strip, sun-drenched golf courses, scenic hiking and biking trails, exciting shopping and dining options of Downtown Summerlin, and striking mountain views beckon from your boutique home base at SITE Summit.

Step into our spacious one-, two-, and three-bedroom, pet-friendly floor plans, and you’ll find newly-upgraded, modern interiors and thoughtful amenities, including full-sized washers and dryers and private patios.

Our secluded pool and spa provide you with a tranquil space to refresh close to home, our central location to the I-215 and McCarran Airport facilitates getaways near and far, and our proximity to major employers, including Southern Hills Hospital, makes commuting a breeze.
Find yourself beautifully centered at SITE Summit.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 735 Sq.
9475 West Tompkins Avenue, Spring Valley, NV, 89147
